name: West Wight Wanderer Day Ranger
description:
WEST WIGHT WANDERER DAY RANGER Unlimited travel for one day with weekday rail time restrictions between Brockenhurst and Lymington Pier and a return journey on Wightlink's ferry between Lymington Pier and Yarmouth 
      on the Isle of Wight. It is available until the 2nd of November 2025. The ticket also includes unlimited travel on Southern Vectis route 7 between Yarmouth, the Needles and Newport and the "Needles Breezer", an open-top bus tour between Yarmouth 
      and The Needles.
